Figure 1: UV/Vis monitoring of chlorosulfonylation reaction using[Cu'l(dmp2),CJCI (green) and [Cu'ldmp2],ICI (red). (A) Copper catalysts alone;(B) reaction mixture for chlorosulfonylation: styrene 1a, tosyl chloride 2a and[Cu'l(dmp 2),CJCI (green)/(Cu(damp2),ICI(red); (C) crude reaction mixture B afterirradiation at 455 nm (blue LED) under N2 atmosphere for 30 h at roomtemperature. All UV/Vis spectra are measured in MeCN (dry, 0.02 mm)

Scheme 3: Trifluoromethylchlorosulfonylation and chlorotrifluorumethylationreaction. Reaction conditions: olefin 1 (0.5 mmol, 1.0 equiv), TFCI 2b(1.0 mmol, 2.0 eqiviv), K2HPO4 (1.10 mmol,2.0 equipiv), [Cu'l'dmp2,CJICI(2,0 mol-%) in MeCN (dry, degassed, 1,5 mL); irradiation at 455 nm (blue LED)under N2 atmosphere for 24 h at room temperature.
